sources.title: Monstroid
sources.description: A giant lake monster, after lying dormant for years, reawakens and starts killing people in a small Colombian town. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

metadata.Plot: A rural Colombian village is attacked by a horrible sea serpent, aroused by industrial pollution of a nearby lake. Based on a real event that took place in June of 1971.
metadata.Writer: Kenneth Hartford, Walter Roeber Schmidt, Herbert L. Strock
metadata.Actors: James Mitchum, John Carradine, Philip Carey
